Looking for iOS 12 compatibility? Check out.

NextUp is a nice little enhancement that allows you to glimpse ahead of the current track and even change it if you don't like the what the future had in store for you.

Don’t like a song? Skip it before it has even started playing.

It’s especially useful for those of you using free accounts with limited number of skips.

Supported apps:





Compatible with Flow, ColorFlow 4, Noctis and Sylph.

* Skipping episodes in Podcasts is only possible with items that the user has manually added to the queue. This is due to the way the Podcasts app is built.

Not working? See thefor known culprits.

Having an issue? Please report it at the public.


See larger Screenshots below..

– Added support for Flow and Nereid. - Added support for the media clients VOX, Musi, Napster and JioSaavn. - Added options for disabling NextUp in CC or LS, slimmed lockscreen mode, disable artwork, hide NextUp when no queued track. – Fixed crash when NextUp was disabled in lockscreen and ColorFlow installed. – Fixed crashes within Spotify and YouTube Music. - ColorFlow improvements. - Switched to new payment system. - Various improvements. – Added option to hide the Quick Action buttons on iPhone X when listening to music (useful with ColorFlow 4).

– Fixed local tracks from iTunes not being detected by NextUp.

– Fixed Notepad compatibility.

– Added Russian translation.
